channel.title: Sports
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Sports, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: College Football Week 13 Preview: Best Games to Watch this Weekend
item.description: Check out the odds for some of the biggest matchups going down in Week 13 of the college football season.

item.title: 2026 FIFA World Cup Final Draw: FOX Sports Details TV, Digital Coverage
item.description: FOX Sports announced on Friday that it will air an unprecedented 3 ½ hours of live coverage of the World Cup draw for the first time ever on broadcast...

item.title: 2025 NBA Cup Odds: Thunder Favored; Lakers in Contention
item.description: The 2025 NBA Cup continues on Friday. See the odds for who is slated to win the latest in-season tournament.

item.title: FOX Super 6 Contest: Geoff Schwartz's College Football Week 13 Picks, Predictions
item.description: Enter the free Super 6 Contest featuring CFB Week 13 for a chance to win cash prizes! And don't worry — Geoff Schwartz is here to help with your picks...

item.title: FOX Super 6 Contest: Chris 'The Bear' Fallica's NFL Week 12 Picks, Predictions
item.description: Enter the free NFL Week 12 Super 6 Contest for a chance to win cash prizes! And don't worry — Chris 'The Bear' Fallica is here to help.

item.title: The Playbook: Lineup locks, Shadow Reports for Week 12
item.description: An all-encompassing look at matchups to exploit or avoid and lineup locks in fantasy, as well as projected scores.

item.title: How Baker Mayfield's 'spark' came back after five games with the Rams
item.description: Although Los Angeles won just two of the five games with Mayfield in 2022, he "ignited" the building.

item.title: Last-minute pickups for Week 12: Target the Brissett-Wilson combo in Arizona
item.description: If bye weeks or injuries have you seeking lineup help, consider the Cardinals passing game and a sneaky defense.

item.title: Our guide to every Week 12 NFL game: Matchup previews, predictions, picks and nuggets
item.description: Another Eagles vs. Cowboys classic? McCaffrey vs. the Panthers? Picks, predictions and stats for every Week 12 game.

item.title: Transfer rumors, news: Man United want Scott McTominay back
item.description: Manchester United are considering a move to bring Scott McTominay back to Old Trafford from Napoli. Transfer Talk has the latest news and rumors.
